• These recommendations apply to pregnant women and adolescent girls within the context of routine ANC.
• This table does not include good clinical practices, such as measuring blood pressure, proteinuria and weight, and checking for fetal heart sounds, which would be included as part of an implementation manual aimed at practitioners.
